name: SEAMLESS Website Framework (VIEW ONLY)
description:
Seamless is a Figma framework designed to make your website projects smoother, faster and more profitable, without compromising on creativity. Using fully responsive primitive sections and interactive components - creating bespoke websites has never been this seamless.


  • Pull website page structures together in seconds with primitive, fully responsive sections
  • Stop wasting time remaking the same things each project with component variants and nested instances
  • Design desktop, tablet and mobile in tandem with responsive breakpoint variants
  • Handover to devs without the endless QA with our robust styleguide
